allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add real-time conversation/notes system for inquiries

- Create inquiry_notes table for storing conversation messages
- Add InquiryNote model with user relationship
- Implement addNote methods for both user and admin controllers
- Add conversation UI in frontend inquiry page with AJAX submission
- Add conversation section in admin inquiry show page
- Enable real-time message display without page refresh
- Show inquiry status messages \(processing/completed/cancelled\)
- Disable messaging for completed or cancelled inquiries

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
